description: [Mafalda](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1060) can delete Windows Event logs by invoking the `OpenEventLogW` and `ClearEventLogW` functions.(Citation: SentinelLabs Metador Sept 2022)

external_references.description: Ehrlich, A., et al. (2022, September). THE MYSTERY OF METADOR | AN UNATTRIBUTED THREAT HIDING IN TELCOS, ISPS, AND UNIVERSITIES. Retrieved January 23, 2023.
